messages.title: A STRONG VOICE FOR WOKING AND OUR VILLAGES
messages.content: Jonathan says: "Elect me as your MP and I will work tirelessly to promote and defend Woking and all of our villages. I will also help down Cameron to deliver the positive change that this country so badly needs."

messages.title: Jonathan Lord: THE RIGHT CHOICE FOR WOKING
messages.content: Jonathan is the Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for the Woking Constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need to change the economy, backing opportunity and aspiration for all like this.
Jonathan is backing Foundation status for St Peter's Hospital and successfully campaigned over several years to save the Stirling Surgery.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election will be one of the most important we've had in decades.

issues.economy: We can't go on like this. We need to change the economy, backing opportunity and aspiration for all like this. We need to curb non existent by encouraging responsibility and breaking the hold the big government. And we need to change our politics.
issues.governance: We need to change our politics.
issues.health: Jonathan is backing Foundation status for St Peter's Hospital and successfully campaigned over several years to save the Stirling Surgery.

politicalExperience.achievements: An active member of Surrey's Health Committee, Jonathan has been helping to secure the future of Woking Community Hospital.
He has been a governor of a school in a deprived area and he will be a passionate supporter of our local schools.

contactInformation.address: Churchill House, Chobham Road, Woking, Surrey GU21 4AA

quotes.text: Elect me as your MP and I will work tirelessly to promote and defend Woking and all of our villages. I will also help David Cameron to deliver the positive change that this country so badly needs.

images.caption: Jonathan Lord with party leader David Cameron.
